400.title: 400 - Bad Request!
400.content: We could not understand your request! Please try again!

401.title: 401 - Unauthorized!
401.content:
You are unauthorized to access !
Maybe you are missing valid credentials?

500.title: 500 - Internal Server Error!
500.content:
There was an internal server errror while processing your request!
It was our fault and we are sorry, please try again later.
